content.rendered:
The film explores the fire of Notre-Dame in Paris in April 2019.

Directed By Jean-Jacques Annaud

Written By Jean-Jacques Annaud. Thomas Bidegain

Stars: Samuel Labarthe. Jean-Paul Bordes. Mickaël Chirinian
